message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob. I take a bit more considering the inflation working against me.
Your turn Alice. Inflation is no joke, let's make this reasonable.
Okay Bob, let's meet in the middle. This offer is closer to my original proposal.
The clock is ticking Alice, this is a fair deal considering the circumstances.
Fine, Bob.  I'll take a smaller cut to get this done. This is your last chance before the inflation really hurts you.
